name: RylTech Industries
description:
RylTech Industries is a 3D first person puzzler that revolves around the mechanic of pushing and pulling objects. Explore the abandoned facility and manipulate the environment around you to aide you in your escape. Find documents to piece together what happened and unravel the mystery that is RylTech Industries.

If you like the game feel free to vote for it on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...

To see more screenshots and see the development of RylTech Industries check out AA Games twitter at https://twitter.com/aagames044

Any questions, comments, or useful advice can be sent to aagames044@gmail.com
